list.description:
当前版本：2.5.0.47 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】
由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】
此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

新增：
美国: M3A3-布雷德利 T55E1
德国: 豹2PL SK105-A2
苏联：BT7M t28-1938
英国：百夫长Mk5/1 ZA-35 蜜罐90 大羚羊Mk7 蜜罐20 大山猫【MTTD】 蜜罐ZT3 号角Mk1A 号角Mk2 TTD
中国：02式突击炮
意大利：三号N 三号突击G 四号G
法国：MARS-15 SK105-A2 EBR-1954
瑞典：91-105 satrv_m41_s1

Current version: 2.5.0.47 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. Because it hasn't been updated for a long time, I just help to update and optimize it. [the productio...

#panther, #panther2, #pantherr_ii, #пантера, #пантер2, #germany , #german, #cemen_054, #cemeh_054, #054

Description:
In the sight, the projectile penetration can be viewed depending on the selected distance. And also the flight time for this distance. So in battle, you can understand what kind of lead to take and whether the projectile can penetrate the target.

Friends, now you can support the development of sights for any am...

#tanksight #reticle #customsight

This time I created a scope reticle based on the USSR Reticle.
It is a simple model without a simple rangefinder, so it can be adapted to any tank.
It is also designed to fit the MBT's high magnification scope, so it will be good for scopes of all magnifications.

I am waiting for impressions comment and Defect report.

German FCS Sights

Notice: Screenshots are currently outdated and show the old thermal colors. Also, I will not be making a sight for the Marder as the zoom and/or FOV makes the sight look like garbage (and I'm lazy). If you want a good Marder sight check out this one https://live.warthunder.com/post/984168/en/ by @eTak.
